comments.content: If it meant to be used as a text face—as opposed to display—I think you should complete the character set (such as accented characters), so you can sell it at a bit higher price.

Hello, mk2!

The original idea is to use as display, but I'm working to complete the character set and I will distribute to people who have already bought.  
Has any further comments?

Thanks for you time!
